title: Ginger & Honey Marinated Tempeh
directions: Combine the soy sauce and balsamic vinegar (or lemon juice) in a bowl.
Add honey, and grate in garlic and ginger (peeled).
Cut tempeh into cubes and stir into the marinade. Let sit for at least 10/15 minutes, giving it the occasional stir.
Stir-fry the tempeh in a bit of oil for about 5 minutes, with the marinade.
If you want to make this vegan, you can replace the honey with a tsp of sugar or a plant-based syrup.
ingredients: piece of ginger the same size as the garlic clove
